member.name: P:Suporte.Controllers.LoginRequest.Pass
member.summary: Password should be an hash (MD5 or SHA-256)

member.name: P:Suporte.Services.RegisterUserInfo.Username
member.summary: The username of the user. Must be at least 5 characters long and contain only letters and numbers.

member.name: P:Suporte.Services.RegisterUserInfo.DisplayName
member.summary: An optional display name for the user. Must be at least 3 characters long.

member.name: P:Suporte.Services.RegisterUserInfo.Email
member.summary: The user's email address. Must be valid and at least 6 characters long.

member.name: P:Suporte.Services.RegisterUserInfo.Number
member.summary: An optional phone number for the user.

member.name: P:Suporte.Services.RegisterUserInfo.CountryCode
member.summary: Optional country code for the user. (+44, +351, etc...)

member.name: P:Suporte.Services.RegisterUserInfo.Password
member.summary: The hashed password of the user. Must be a valid MD5 (32 hexadecimal characters) or SHA-256 (64 hexadecimal characters) hash.
